title: Author, I Want To Leave My Job!!
alternative_title: Tác Giả, Em Muốn Nghỉ Việc!
status: Tác Giả, Em Muốn Nghỉ Việc!
description:
Description :
        Cuong Thinh is a young man that has lived through 19 green Springs in a life, and is as straight as the National Highway 1A. During these times however, he is in need of a job.Enter Pis Bear, a famous comic author (in his imagination), who specializes in drawing stories about boys bent like incense. He is in need of an assistant immediately. With supply and demand, they come together as well as a theorem in market economics. But something is happening so slowly that might change Thinh's life and have it never to return to its former state again..."Author, I want to quit my job!!"+
